# 1Ô∏è‚É£ Foundation Prompts ‚Äî Starting Any Data Task

## üîπ Prompt 1: Understand My Dataset
```

Please examine its structure, variable types, missingness, and give me:

## üîπ Prompt 2: Generate a Full EDA Plan
```
